Module Index Search

munchlax.lib.mpim module¶

class munchlax.lib.mpim.MPIM(slack, MPim)¶

Bases: munchlax.lib.object.Object

Represents a Slack MPIM channel.

close()¶

Closes the MPIM channel.

Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return ok.
get_history(latest='now', oldest=0, inclusive=True, count=100)¶

Fetches and returns the message history for the MPIM.

Parameters:
  • latest (float | now) – The end of time range of messages to include. This can be a float or now If now is specified then the current time is used. Defaults to now.
  • oldest (float) – The start of time range of messages to include. Defaults to 0.
  • inclusive (bool) – Whether or not to include messages with latest of oldest timestamps. Defaults to True.
  • count (int) – The number of messages to return, between 1 and 1000. Defaults to 100.
Returns:

A list of Message objects. bool: Whether or not there are more messages in the IM’s history.
Return type:

list (Message)
Raises:

SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return ok.
get_replies(ts)¶

Fetches and returns all replies to a message within the MPIM.

Parameters:ts – The timestamp of the parent message to look for.
Returns:
A list of Message objects representing a message
thread.
Return type:list (Message)
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return ok.
mark(ts)¶

Changes the last-read indicator in the MPIM for the current user.

Parameters:ts (float) – The timestamp to use when changing the last-read indicator.
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return ok.
